ST26-001.name: Soba Mask ST26-001
ST26-001.effect: If you have a [San-Gorou] or [Sanji] Character with 7000 base power or more, give this card in your hand −5 cost. [On Play] Return all of your [San-Gorou] and [Sanji] Characters to the owner's hand.

ST26-002.name: Tony Tony Chopper ST26-002
ST26-002.effect: [Blocker] [On Play] DON!! −2: Rest up to 1 of your opponent's DON!! cards or Characters with a cost of 1 or less.

ST26-003.name: Nico Robin ST26-003
ST26-003.effect: [On Play] DON!! −2: Add up to 1 DON!! card from your DON!! deck and set it as active.

ST26-004.name: General Franky ST26-004
ST26-004.effect: [On Play] DON!! −2: Give up to 2 of your opponent's Characters −2000 power during this turn.

ST26-005.name: Monkey D. Luffy ST26-005
ST26-005.effect: [On Play]/[When Attacking] DON!! −2: If your Leader is multicolored and your opponent has 5 or more DON!! cards on their field, your {Straw Hat Crew} type Leader's base power becomes 7000 until the end of your opponent's next End Phase.
